name: Zombie Shooter (itch) (S-WANEM24)
description:
This is a top down shooter game.

The object is to survive the endless waves of zombie.

Controls:
- A/W/S/D to move around
- Mouse to look around
- Left click to shoot
- R to reload
- Right click to use flamethrower

Art Credits:
rileygombart and keith karnage
